item.title: IDE_Fantasy glove
item.description: Last semester i attended the “music informatics” course of the university. As an assignment for the course i chose to take part in the “IDE Fantasy” performance of Proffesor Iannis Zannos. My task was to develope a sensor glove which would be worn by dancers, the data gathered of the gloves would be used to create a audiovisual performance in parallel with the dance performance. At the same time at other locations dancers would use the glove and connected over internet make a collective audiovisual piece.
